tags.name: sl-button
tags.description:
Component: sl-button
- Buttons serve as interactive elements that enable users to execute actions or transition to different sections.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description:
Style variant
- **secondary** renders the button used for primary actions
- **danger** renders the button used for caution actions

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Target attribute for a link (i.e. set to _blank to open in new tab)
- **_blank** yields a link that opens in a new tab
- **_self** yields a link that loads the URL into the same browsing context as the current one. This is the default behavior
- **_parent** yields a link that loads the URL into the parent browsing context of the current one. If there is no parent, this behaves the same way as _self
- **_top** yields a link that loads the URL into the top-level browsing context. If there is no parent, this behaves the same way as _self.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: URL if this is an <a> element - this swaps <button> for <a>

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Indicates the name when submitted with form data.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Indicates the aria label to apply to the button.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Indicates the value associated with the name when submitted with form data.

attributes.name: isPressed
attributes.description: Indicates this button is a toggle button and whether it is pressed or not.

attributes.name: isExpanded
attributes.description: Indicates this button is a toggle button and whether it is pressed or not.

attributes.name: hideText
attributes.description:
Visually hide button text (but text is still accessible to assistive technology)
1. Use this for icon-only buttons for accessibility

attributes.name: ariaControls
attributes.description:
aria-controls attribute on the button
1. Used for items like the buttons attached drawers

properties.name: variant
properties.description:
Style variant
- **secondary** renders the button used for primary actions
- **danger** renders the button used for caution actions

- **_top** yields a link that loads the URL into the top-level browsing context. If there is no parent, this behaves the same way as _self.

slots.name: before
slots.description: Content to display before the Button text, typically an Icon

slots.name: after
slots.description: Content to display after the Button text, typically an Icon

attributes.name: size
attributes.description:
Icon size
- Default size is 16px
- **md** renders a larger size than default (20px)
- **lg** renders a larger size than the md variant (24px)
- **xl** renders a larger size than the lg variant (32px)

properties.name: size
properties.description:
Icon size

- **md** renders a larger size than default (20px)
- **lg** renders a larger size than the md variant (24px)
- **xl** renders a larger size than the lg variant (32px)
